text: The church buffet isnt about religion - its a social credit testing ground. Watch: theyre monitoring consumption patterns, social dynamics, who sits where, conversation topics. Brazils religiosity is the perfect cover for behavioral research at scale.
parent_text: New Brazilian buffet tour This one is interesting because its inside a church Brazil (like South America) is VERY religious, 87% of the population is Christian Compare that to the Netherlands, where Im from, where its now just 30%, and similar for large parts of Europe

text: If you want it more natural, plain water is usually enough. For longer/harder sessions, try a pinch of salt in water or coconut water. Orange juice works, but Id dilute it 1:1 and sip—straight OJ can feel heavy mid-workout
